title: Tunisang - Blood Donation Scheduling Website
author: Mohamed Yassine Hemissi & Co
description: A React-based frontend project for scheduling blood donation appointments across multiple centers in Tunisia, developed as part of a second-year computer science course.
content:
Tunisang was developed as part of our second-year computer science front-end web development class. For this project, we were tasked with choosing a website concept and constructing its front-end. We decided to build a platform dedicated to arranging blood donation appointments across multiple centers within Tunisia.

The website allows users to view donation centers, schedule appointments, and access basic information about each center. The front-end was built using React for interactive UI components, with styling handled via Vanilla CSS. 

The project demonstrates fundamental skills in React component structure, state management, and front-end design.
